summary.overview: CDRA is a CICS transaction that provides account inquiry services through message queue processing. The transaction retrieves customer account information including balances, credit limits, and account status based on account ID requests received via MQ queues.
business_functions: Initialize System - Set up message queues and system variables for processing
Retrieve Queue Information - Get input queue details that triggered the transaction
Open Message Queues - Establish connections to input, reply, and error queues
Get Request Message - Receive account inquiry requests from the input queue
Parse Request Parameters - Extract function code and account ID from incoming messages
Validate Request Format - Verify request has valid function code and account ID
Read Account Record - Retrieve account information from account data file
Format Account Response - Build response with account details, balances, limits, and dates
Handle Account Not Found - Generate error message for non-existent account IDs
Handle Invalid Request - Generate error message for malformed or invalid requests
Send Reply Message - Deliver formatted response to the reply queue
Handle Processing Errors - Route error details to error queue when processing fails
Process Multiple Messages - Continue processing until all messages are handled
Close Message Queues - Clean up queue connections when processing completes
Terminate Program - Perform cleanup and return control to CICS

CDRA.program_overview: Processes account inquiry requests via MQ queues and retrieves account information

datasource_summary.name: Account Master Data File (ACCTDAT)
datasource_summary.function: Stores comprehensive account information including account details, current balance, credit limits, important dates, and account status for customer account inquiries

datasource_summary.name: Account Inquiry Request Queue (INPUT-QUEUE-NAME)
datasource_summary.function: Receives incoming account inquiry requests from external systems and applications that need to retrieve customer account information

datasource_summary.name: Account Inquiry Response Queue (CARD.DEMO.REPLY.ACCT)
datasource_summary.function: Sends account inquiry response messages containing requested account information back to the requesting external systems

datasource_summary.name: Error Message Queue (CARD.DEMO.ERROR)
datasource_summary.function: Sends error messages and notifications when account inquiry processing failures or business rule violations occur
